title: iOS 15.4 beta 3 now prompts users to review Emergency SOS settings after update
content:
iOS 15.4 is certainly a big update ,as it brings features like Face ID while wearing a mask and Universal Control, but it seems there’s more to come. Following the release of iOS 15.4 beta 3 to developers on Tuesday, some people have noticed that the system now prompts users to review their Emergency SOS settings after the update.

more…

The post iOS 15.4 beta 3 now prompts users to review Emergency SOS settings after update appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Right after installing iOS 15.4, the Settings app shows an alert asking the user to review the settings of the Emergency SOS feature.
